hooks: "my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored"
"i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found"
csv:
Hook,Slide 1,Slide 2,Slide 3,Slide 4,Slide 5
"my doctor said it was normal aging pain...until i found the x-ray from 6 years ago they ignored","for 2 years they told me 'this is just part of getting older' while my feet got worse","i tried everything they suggested: rest exercise ice heat stretching nothing worked","then i found my old x-ray showing the SAME issue they now called 'aging'","turns out Vibit targets the actual nerve pressure causing the pain","now i can garden shop & play with grandkids - pain free at last"
"i thought my feet were supposed to hurt at 65...until my neighbor showed me what her doctor found","watching my neighbor walk pain-free at 70 made me question everything","spent $400 on 'senior comfort shoes' that only made things worse","she showed me her before/after scans - same exact symptoms i had","Vibit was her secret - targeted relief without endless doctor visits","3 weeks later im dancing again - first time in 5 years"
